name: I'm not proud
description:
Arnaldo isn't proud of what he's done...

 But even so, he won't say anything. He showed up in a very strange place, you can't know if it's his house or not, because he's not very trustworthy, you know... Try to help him out or leave him there. It's your choice...

The controls are arrow keys to move and space to skip dialogs.

I made all the art in the game!
